text: Asante Kotoko's game against Kwara United won't be a walkover – Sarfo Duku.
translated: Asante Kotoko ne Kwara United di asi a, ɛrenyɛ sɛ obi a ɔbɛkɔ akɔto ne ho.
backtranslated: Asante Kotoko will not be considered for the next round of the playoffs against Kwara United.

text: At least 13 drown fleeing armed men in northwest Nigeria.
translated: Sɛ anyɛ yiye koraa no, mmarima a wɔakyekyere wɔn ho no 13 wui wɔ Nigeria atifi fam atɔe fam.
backtranslated: At least 13 of the men who were hanged died in northwestern Nigeria.

text: Kumawu MP urges Parliament to act on crisis in Ghana’s prisons.
translated: Kumawu MP tu mpɔn sɛ wɔmfa nto afiase a ɛwɔ Ghana no mu nyɛ ho biribi.
backtranslated: MP Kumawu is better off in prison in Ghana.

text: Diddy declines to testify, praises judge as sex trafficking trial nears end.
translated: Diddy ampene so sɛ ɔbɛbɔ adanse, na ɔkamfoo ɔtemmufo no bere a ɔbea ne ɔbarima nna aguadi ho asɛm no reyɛ awie no.
backtranslated: Diddy refused to testify and praised the judge as the sex trade was coming to an end.

text: 'Asibolanga' and all the 2022 beef songs that took the internet by storm.
translated: 'Asibolanga' ne 2022 nam nnwom a agye Intanɛt no nyinaa.
backtranslated: 'Asibolanga' is 2022 through all the popular music on the Internet.

text: 'Act now before the situation deteriorates' – NDC Spain branch tells Mahama amid rising 'insecurity’.
translated: "Momfa mo ho nsiesie seesei ansa na tebea no ayɛ bɔne"  NDC Spain baa dwumadibea no ka kyerɛ Mahama wɔ 'ahokyere a ɛrekɔ so' mu.
backtranslated: "Be prepared now before the situation gets worse", the Spanish branch of the NDC tells Mahama in the 'emerging crisis'.

text: Was Jose Mourinho right?: Unpacking the lows of Dele Alli’s football career.
translated: So na Jose Mourinho di nokware?: Dele Allin bɔmpɔn adwuma no mu nsõ a na ɛwɔ ne nsam no.
backtranslated: Was Jose Mourinho honest?: Dele Allin's career was in the dust.

text: Rema's Calm Down falls off Billboard Hot 100 after setting new record.
translated: Rema de Calm Down fii Billboard Hot 100 mu bere a ɔde rekodi foforo sii hɔ no.
backtranslated: Rema dropped Calm Down from the Billboard Hot 100 after setting a new record.

text: 'I have always wanted a girl' - Rihanna opens up on pressure of raising two sons.
translated: 'Mepɛ abaayewa bere nyinaa' - Rihanna ka sɛ, sɛ ɔhwɛ mmabarima baanu a, ɔhyɛ no den.
backtranslated: 'I've always wanted a girl' - says Rihanna, who is encouraged by two boys.

text: Adjusted level 2: Presido announce new restrictions for South Africa to contain Coronavirus.
translated: Asase a wɔasesa no: Presido de nsiesiei foforo a wɔde asi hɔ ama South Africa de asiesie Coronavirus no ho amanneɛbɔ.
backtranslated: Changes in territory: Presido announces new measures in response to the Coronavirus in South Africa.

text: 'What kind of nonsense is that?' - Prophet descends on GRNMA.
translated: 'Ahuhude bɛn na ɛte saa?' - Ɔsɛnkafo no kɔ GRNMA so.
backtranslated: 'What is this nonsense?' - The publisher goes on GRNMA.

text: 2023 AFCON: Ivory Coast Cote coach slams Nigeria for being overly defensive.
translated: 2023 AFCON: Ivory Coast Mannipa no kyerɛkyerɛfo ka sɛ Nigeriafo di wɔn ho so dodo.
backtranslated: 2023 AFCON: The Ivory Coast Man's coach says Nigerians are too self-sufficient.

text: DKB and DJ Slim lock horns online.
translated: DKB ne DJ Slim de wɔn ho hyɛ Intanɛt so.
backtranslated: DKB and DJ Slim are making a name for themselves online.

text: Dr Apostle Amagashie warns men against popular lovemaking position, cites stroke risk.
translated: Ɔbenfo Amagashie bɔ mmarima kɔkɔ wɔ ɔdɔ ho a nnipa pii gye tom ho, na ɔreka ɔyaredɔm ho asɛm.
backtranslated: Professor Amagashie warns men about popular love and speaks of a pandemic.

text: Police arrest alleged serial motorbike thief.
translated: Wɔde mmobɔde ho akorɔmfo bi a polisifo kyeree no.
backtranslated: A thief of the crime scene was arrested by the police.

text: FIFA imposes transfer ban on Hearts of Oak over unsettled $150,000 debt.
translated: FIFA hyɛe sɛ wɔmfa sika a wɔde ma Hearts of Oak no mfi hɔ esiane ɛka a enni mu a ɛboro dɔla 150,000 no nti.
backtranslated: FIFA has ordered the cancellation of funding for Hearts of Oak due to a lack of funding of more than $150,000.

text: 'Mickey Mouse' boxer toasts Cape Verde's first Olympic medal.
translated: 'Mickey Mouse' bɔmmɔfo no de nkonimdifo no maa Cape Verde Olympic nkonimdifo a wodi kan.
backtranslated: The creator of the 'Mickey Mouse' awarded the winner the first Cape Verdean Olympic medalists.

text: APP leader reacts after court throws out injunction against Akwatia by-election.
translated: APP panyin no yɛɛ n'ade bere a asɛnnibea no de mmara a ɛkyere Akwatia mmapɔw mu nhyiamu no too gua no.
backtranslated: The APP chief acted after the court issued a ruling banning the Akwatia exercise session.

text: Igbo leader addresses land acquisition allegations, apologises to Ghanaians.
translated: Igbo panyin no de asase a wɔtɔn no ho sobo ahorow no ho asɛm to gua, na ɔde kyɛw ka kyerɛ Ghanafo.
backtranslated: The Igbo chief has announced the allegations of land sales and apologized to Ghanaians.

text: Bukom Arena gets face-lift to host Basketball games.
translated: Wɔmaa Bukom Arena yɛɛ Basketball agodibea.
backtranslated: Bukom Arena was converted into a Basketball stadium.

text: Afenyo-Markin apologises to Prof Ayensu-Danquah over 'strangely, you get a ministerial appointment' comment.
translated: Afenyo-Markin de asɛm a ɔkae sɛ 'yɛyɛ nwonwa sɛ wo nsa ka ɔsom adwuma no' no kyɛw maa Ɔbenfo Ayensu-Danquah.
backtranslated: Afenyo-Markin apologized to Professor Ayensu-Danquah for saying 'we are surprised you've got the job.'

text: Asawa National Open Championship slated for June 19.
translated: Asawa National Open Championship a wɔahyɛ ato hɔ June 19.
backtranslated: Asawa National Open Championship scheduled for June 19.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Kwaku Dawuro presents The Movement in the Morning Political Show.
translated: NNIPA A WƆDE HƆ: Kwaku Dawuro na ɔde The Movement in the Morning Political Show no rema.
backtranslated: THE OWNER: Kwaku Dawuro is presenting The Movement in the Morning Political Show.

text: 'God willing, I will receive my Lamborghini; I have documents to prove it's mine’ - Shatta Wale.
translated: 'Sɛ Onyankopɔn pɛ a, mɛma me Lamborghini no; mewɔ adansedi a ɛkyerɛ sɛ ɛyɛ me dea' - Shatta Wale.
backtranslated: 'If God wills, I will give my Lamborghini; I have proof that it is mine.' - Shatta Wale.

text: Helicopter Crash: Ibrahim Mahama offers to clear the debts of Dr Murtala, Alhaji Muniru.
translated: Helicopter Crash: Ibrahim Mahama de ne ho hyɛ Dr. Murtala, Alhaji Muniru ho.
backtranslated: Helicopter Crash: Ibrahim Mahama is involved with Dr. Murtala, Alhaji Muniru.

text: Tennis legend Rafael Nadal to retire in November.
translated: Tenis ho anansesɛm Rafael Nadal begyae adwuma no November mu.
backtranslated: Tennis legend Rafael Nadal is to retire in November.

text: Enforce maternity-friendly workplace policies - Samuel Atidzah.
translated: Fa adwuma a ɛma mmofra tumi nya mma ma wɔn ho yɛ den no hyɛ mu - Samuel Atidzah.
backtranslated: Join the work that makes children stronger - Samuel Atidzah.

text: GEC Open returns to Ghana.
translated: GEC Open san kɔ Ghana.
backtranslated: GEC Open is back in Ghana.

text: 'From dawn raid to helping with investigation to arraignment' - Azar calls out IGP over arrest of NPP activist.
translated: 'Fi adekyee mu kɔboa nhwehwɛmu kɔsi asennii' - Azar frɛ IGP sɛ ɔnkyere NPP ho ɔmansin sohwɛfo.
backtranslated: 'From dawn to court to assist in the investigation' - Azar calls on IGP to arrest the NPP district superintendent.

text: Home-based Ghana players seek more opportunities after good outing against South Africa.
translated: Ghanafo a wɔwɔ fie no hwehwɛ hokwan pii wɔ South Africa anim.
backtranslated: Home Ghanaians are looking for more opportunities in South Africa.

text: Akwatia By-Election: We cannot be intimidated - NPP’s Haruna Mohammed.
translated: Akwatia Nkorɔfo Aponto: Wɔrentumi mma yɛn ho kwan - NPP  Haruna Mohammed.
backtranslated: The Leper People's Party: We cannot be allowed - NPP Haruna Mohammed.

text: Some top Ghanaian musicians who ditched secular music for ministry.
translated: Wɔn a wɔato nnwom no bi a wɔagye din wɔ Ghana a wɔagyae wiase nnwom no de kɔɔ asɛnka.
backtranslated: Some of Ghana's most famous musicians who have left worldly music have gone out in the field.

text: Joseph Awinongya Jr emerges as number 1 boxer in the USA in top 6 u-20 amateur boxers.
translated: Joseph Awinongya Jr yɛ United States ɔbɔmmɔfo a ɔtɔ so 1 wɔ U-20 amateur bɔmmɔfo 6 a wɔdi kan mu.
backtranslated: Joseph Awinongya Jr. is a United States number 1 player in the top 6 U-20 amateur players.

text: Amenfi Central set for major road overhaul.
translated: Amenfi Central wɔ hɔ a, wɔbɛsan asiesie kwan no yiye.
backtranslated: The road will be fully restored from Amenvi Central.

text: Bui Power nets $64.
translated: Bui Power Net $64.
backtranslated: Bui Power Net $64.

text: GCTU warns against defamatory publications, threatens legal action.
translated: GCTU bɔ kɔkɔ wɔ nhoma a wɔka animtiaa ho, na ɛbɔ sobo sɛ wɔde asɛm bɛto asɛnnibea.
backtranslated: The GCTU warns against contempt of court and charges that the book will be prosecuted.

text: American porn star Nasir sends message to Shugatiti as ‘orgasm’ challenge delays.
translated: Amerikafo aguamansɛm ho ɔbenfo Nasir de nkra kɔma Shugatiti sɛ orgasm akyigyinae.
backtranslated: American pornologist Nasir sends a message to Shugatiti as an orgasm call.

text: I won 'contentious' unannounced 2019 VGMA Artiste of the Year Award - Stonebwoy claims.
translated: Stonebwoy kae sɛ, minyaa 'akasakasa' a wɔanka ho asɛm wɔ 2019 VGMA Artist of the Year Award no mu.
backtranslated: Stonebwoy said, I received an 'unnamed' 'talk' in the 2019 VGMA Artist of the Year Award.

text: Helicopter Crash: 'You have not won; Christ has' – Wife of Sergeant Mensah shames death.
translated: Helicopter Crash: 'Wonnye nni; Kristo na wadi nkonim'  Sergeant Mensah yere aniwu.
backtranslated: Helicopter Crash: 'You don't believe; Christ has won' Shame on Sergeant Mensah's wife.

text: 'He took me in and mentored me' - Ofori Amponsah delivers a heartfelt tribute to Daddy Lumba.
translated: 'Ɔfaa me na ɔkyerɛɛ me' - Ofori Amponsah de obu a efi komam maa Daddy Lumba.
backtranslated: 'He took me and taught me' - Ofori Amponsah with sincere respect for Daddy Lumba.

text: 'How can I enter a house with familiar spirits' - Appiah Danquah reacts to NPP's amnesty for members.
translated: 'Mɛyɛ dɛn akɔ fie a nkurɔfo nim me?' - Appiah Danquah ka NPP no kyɛw a wɔde ma wɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ no ho asɛm.
backtranslated: 'How can I go to a house where people know me?' - Appiah Danquah talks about the NPP's hat-gathering.

text: High cholesterol can cause black toes and feet – Health expert.
translated: Kolesterol a ɛboro so betumi ama nan ne nan anan asaw  Akwahosan ho nimdefo.
backtranslated: Excessive cholesterol can cause foot and ankle sprains.

text: Rev.
translated: Ɔsɔfo.
backtranslated: A priest.

text: Ato Forson backs calls for fair deal on Africa's $1.
translated: Ato Forson pene so ma wɔhwehwɛ Afrika dɔla biako no mu biako.
backtranslated: Ato Forson agrees to seek one African dollar.

text: Homowo: Nii Okanta Ankrah II calls for unity, peace and teamwork.
translated: Homowo: Nii Okanta Ankrah II frɛ biakoyɛ, asomdwoe ne kuw mu adwuma.
backtranslated: Homoeopathy: The Soul Okanta Ankrah II calls for unity, peace and teamwork.

text: NPP would have still punished Akua Afriyie if she had won – Nana Akomea.
translated: Sɛ NPP nyaa Nana Akomea a, anka anka anka wɔbɛtwe Akua Afriyie aso.
backtranslated: If the NPP had won Nana Akomea, the Akua Afriyie would have been punished.

text: A producer told me ‘Agya W’ahwe Me So’ was a terrible song with a horrible video – Rose Adjei.
translated: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo bi ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ Agya Wahwe Me So yɛ dwom a ɛyɛ hu a video a ɛyɛ hu a  Rose Adjei ayɛ no.
backtranslated: A teacher told me that Dad Fell At Me was a horror song made by a horror video by Rose Adjei.

text: NDC grassroots demand answers over helicopter crash, suspect foul play.
translated: NDCfo hwehwɛ mmuae wɔ helikopta a ɛresɛe no ho, na wosusuw sɛ wɔde bɔne ayɛ.
backtranslated: NDCs are looking for answers about the helicopter crash and suspect they have committed a crime.

text: Key takeaways from EOCO's statement on Shatta Wale's Lamborghini case.
translated: EOCO asɛm a ɛfa Shatta Wale Lamborghini asɛm no ho no, emu nsɛm atitiriw bi.
backtranslated: A few highlights from the EOCO article on the Shatta Wale Lamborghini case.

text: FDA intercepts GH¢11.
translated: FDA no twaa GH¢11.
backtranslated: The FDA has cut GH¢11.

text: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Resolve outstanding issues to stem chaos!!.
translated: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Munsiesie nsɛm a ɛda hɔ no na ama moatwe mo ho afi amumɔyɛ ho!!.
backtranslated: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Prepare the content and stay away from crime!!.

text: Sharp rise in fire injuries and deaths in first half of 2025 by 33%  – GNFS.
translated: Ɔhaw a afi afi mu aba ne owuo mu a ɛkɔɔ so kɛse wɔ afe 2025 fã a edi kan no mu no so kɔɔ so kɔɔ so kɔɔ so kɛse; saa bere no, na nnipa dodow a wɔyare ne wɔn a wowuwui no dodow yɛ 33%  GNFS.
backtranslated: The resulting domestic crisis and mortality rate, which increased significantly in the first half of 2025, continued to increase significantly; at that time, the incidence and mortality rate was 33% GNFS.

text: Why we signed Mohammed Kudus – Tottenham coach Thomas Frank explains.
translated: Nea enti a yɛhyɛɛ Mohammed Kudus  Tottenham ɔhwɛfo Thomas Frank kyerɛkyerɛ mu.
backtranslated: Thomas Frank, Tottenham manager, explains why we have persuaded Mohammed Kudus.

text: 'I love women if you don't understand, go to hell' - Old video of Kofi Jumah resurfaces.
translated: 'M'ani gye mmea ho sɛ wunnim a, kɔ hell' - video dedaw bi a ɛfa Kofi Jumah ho no puee bio.
backtranslated: 'I like women, you know, go to hell' - an old video about Kofi Jumah has resurfaced.

text: Islamic Banking: A financial game changer for all Ghanaians, not just Muslims.
translated: Islamic Banking: Sika ho asɛm a ɛsakra Ghanafo nyinaa adwene, ɛnyɛ Muslimfo nko ara.
backtranslated: Islamic Banking: A financial issue that has changed the minds of all Ghanaians, not just Muslims.

text: Screen-Addiction Among Children: A note to parents.
translated: Ɛho Hia Mmofra a Wɔda So Ara Di Sini Ho Dodow: Nkrataa a Wɔde Kɔma Awofo.
backtranslated: Children Still Watching Movies: Letters to Parents

text: Why Fatawu Issahaku was not called up by Otto Addo – GFA explains.
translated: Nea enti a Otto Addo amfrɛ Fatawu Issahaku no  GFA kyerɛkyerɛ mu.
backtranslated: Otto Addo's GFA explains why he did not call Fatawu Issahaku.

text: Agradaa’s parents slam brother for locking out Angel Asiamah from property.
translated: Agradaa awofo bɔɔ ne nuabarima sobo sɛ wakyekyere Angel Asiamah afi fie hɔ.
backtranslated: Agrada's parents accused her brother of driving Angel Asiamah out of the house.

text: Ablekuma North Rerun: Ayawaso North MP reacts to alleged journalist assault.
translated: Ablekuma North Rerun: Ayawaso North MP no yɛɛ n'ade wɔ nsɛmmɔnedifo ho.
backtranslated: Ablekuma North Rerun: Ayawaso North MP responded to the criminals.

text: Ghana Armwrestling sends goodwill message to BECE, WASSCE candidates.
translated: Ghana Armwrestling de adwempa nkra ma BECE, WASSCE agyenkwa.
backtranslated: Ghana Armwrestling is sending a message of goodwill to BECE, WASSCE's savior.

text: Military officer’s wife begins attempt to break GWR for Longest Reading Aloud Marathon.
translated: Ɔsraani panyin yere fii ase bɔɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛsɛe GWR wɔ Akwankyerɛ a Ɛsen Biara a Wɔkenkan Tenten no mu.
backtranslated: The commander's wife began to try to destroy GWR in the Longest Reading Guide.

text: Sammy Flex speaks after reassignment in Shatta Wale’s management.
translated: Sammy Flex kasae bere a wɔsan de no kɔɔ Shatta Wale's anim.
backtranslated: Sammy Flex spoke when he was brought back to the front of Shatta Wale's.

text: Ghanaians shocked by death of President Mills.
translated: Ɔmanpanyin Mills wu no yɛɛ Ghanafo nwonwa.
backtranslated: The death of President Mills shocked Ghanaians.

text: National Delegates Conference: NPP NEC set to reject petition from Akufo-Addo, Kufuor.
translated: Amanaman Nkabomfo Nhyiam: NPP NEC asiesie sɛ wobegye Akufo-Addo, Kufuor, nkrataa no atom.
backtranslated: UN General Assembly: NPP NEC has agreed to accept the Akufo-Addo, Kufuor, documents.

text: Ghanaians must see the lessons we have learned - Dr Bawumia.
translated: Ɛsɛ sɛ Ghanafo hu nea yɛasua afi mu - Dr. Bawumia.
backtranslated: Ghanaians should know what we have learned from this - Dr. Bawumia.

text: One dead in fire outbreak at uncompleted fuel station near Ejura.
translated: Ɔbarima bi wui wɔ ogyaframa bi a ɛreyɛ asɔ wɔ baabi a wɔhyew a ɛbɛn Ejura no mu.
backtranslated: A man died in a flaming fire near Ejura.

text: 'Rubbish, on which road?' – Nigeria’s Formula 1 hosting bid sparks backlash on social media.
translated: 'Ahuhude, ɔkwan bɛn so na worekɔ?'  Nigeria Formula 1 animde a wɔde bɛma no no ma nkurɔfo nya nkɛntɛnso wɔ nkratafa so.
backtranslated: 'Wow, how are you going?' The Nigerian Formula 1 title makes a page impression.

text: 'My life changed after the accident' - McBrown speaks after arm surgery.
translated: McBrown ka bere a wɔtwee ne nsa no wiei no sɛ: 'Adan a na mewom no sesae.
backtranslated: "My room changed", recalls McBrown after the hand was taken out.

text: Democracy Cup: Deputy EC boss calls for participation in curtain-raiser fixtures.
translated: Democracy Cup: Ɔman no mu panyin boafo no ka sɛ wɔmfa wɔn ho nhyɛ nsrahwɛ a wɔyɛ no wɔ hɔ.
backtranslated: Democracy Cup: The deputy prime minister invites them to participate in the visit.

text: FULL LIST: NPP approves 54 motions at 2025 Delegates Conference.
translated: NPL: NPP penee mmusuakuw 54 so wɔ 2025 Amanneɛbɔ Nhyiam ase.
backtranslated: NPL: The NPP approved 54 tribes at the 2025 Reporting Conference.

text: Four times Afia Schwar has been embroiled in legal battles.
translated: Afia Schwar adi nsɛm a ɛtete saa mpɛn anan.
backtranslated: Afia Schwar has made four such statements.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Parliament debates Ablekuma North rerun violence.
translated: LIVESTREAMED: Amanaman mufo susuw Ablekuma Atifi fam basabasayɛ ho.
backtranslated: LIVESTREAMED: The violence in North Ablekuma is being discussed by the international community.

text: Appau-Klu denies allegations of land encroachment, abuse of power.
translated: Appau-Klu gye toom sɛ obi adi asase so agoru, na ɔde tumi adi dwuma ɔkwammɔne so.
backtranslated: Appau-Klu admitted to being a playground and to misusing power.

text: Spotlight on Lumba's first 'Yee Ye Aka Akwantuom' album.
translated: Lumba nnwom a edi kan a wɔato din 'Yee Ye Aka Akwantuom' no, na ɛreyɛ ayɛ sɛ nea ɛrekɔ so.
backtranslated: Lumba's first single, 'Yee Ye Aka Aktratuom', was almost on the way.

text: KIA begins enforcing reintroduced COVID-19 measures.
translated: KIA fii ase de COVID-19 ho akwan horow a wɔasan de aba no hyɛɛ adwuma.
backtranslated: KIA has started implementing various COVID-19 recovery measures.

text: BoG puts digital credit services under regulation to boost financial inclusion.
translated: BoG de sika a wɔde ma sika ho nhyehyɛe hyɛ nnwinnade a wɔde ma sika ho nhyehyɛe ase.
backtranslated: BoG uses financial planning to create financial instruments.

text: Fatau Dauda confident of Black Stars wins against Chad and Mali.
translated: Fatau Dauda gye di sɛ Black Stars bedi nkonim wɔ Chad ne Mali so.
backtranslated: Fatau Dauda believes that the Black Stars will win over Chad and Mali.

text: 'I am committed to continue the legacy of late Dr Murtala Mohammed' – Princess Naama.
translated: 'Mepɛ sɛ mɛkɔ so de Dr. Murtala Mohammed agyapade no akɔ so'  Ɔhemmaa Naama.
backtranslated: 'I want to continue to carry on the legacy of Dr. Murtala Mohammed' Queen Naama.

text: Watch as M.
translated: Hwɛ sɛ M.
backtranslated: See that M.

text: First cholera cases confirmed across three districts in the Ashanti Region.
translated: Wɔ Ashanti Asase so no, wɔhuu sɛ wɔadi kokoam wɔ amantam abiɛsa mu.
backtranslated: And they found them in the land of Ashanti, and hid them in three provinces.

text: GH¢20m Defamation Suit: Empress Gifty's lawyer confirms Agradaa seeks case transfer.
translated: GH¢20m Duma Asɛm: Ɔman no mu ɔsraani a ɔhwɛ ɔhemmaa Gifty anim no ka sɛ Agradaa pɛ sɛ wɔde asɛm no kɔ hɔ.
backtranslated: GH¢20m Name Message: The national guard in front of the Queen Gifty says Agrada wants to take the case to court.

text: Mohammed Kudus shines with assist on Tottenham debut in Reading win.
translated: Mohammed Kudus de mmoa maa Tottenham ne Reading dii nkonim.
backtranslated: Mohammed Kudus helped Tottenham and Reading to win the title.

text: Read full details of official brochure on 8 fallen heroes from tragic August 6 helicopter crash.
translated: Kenkan nhomawa a ɛka ɔbosom akraman baawɔtwe a wɔhwe ase wɔ ɔhaw a ɛtoo helikopta August 6 no ho nsɛm no mu nsɛm pii.
backtranslated: Read more about the brochure that details the eight stray dogs who crashed in the helicopter crash on August 6.

text: Kojo Barnni beats Torgah on sudden death to win 9th edition of Gold Fields PGA Championship.
translated: Kojo Barnni dii Torgah so nkonim wɔ owu ho mpofirim de dii nkonim wɔ Gold Fields PGA Championship no edi kan.
backtranslated: Kojo Barnni defeated Torgah by sudden death to win the Gold Fields PGA Championship for the first time.

text: 'He has taken all my happiness away' – Daddy Lumba's sister cries.
translated: 'Ɔde anigye nyinaa afiri me nsam'  Papa Lumba nuabea no sui.
backtranslated: 'He took all the joy out of my hand,' Father Lumba's sister cried.

text: 'Nowhere does the law empower you to judge professorial titles' – Barker-Vormawor to GTEC.
translated: 'Biribiara nni hɔ a mmara ma wo tumi sɛ bu akyerɛkyerɛfo din'  Barker-Vormawor to GTEC.
backtranslated: 'There is no legal authority to name teachers' Barker-Vormawor to GTEC.

text: 'I love Stonebwoy; his talent is beyond the shores of Ghana' - Video of late Murtala resurfaces.
translated: 'M'ani gye Stonebwoy ho; ne nyansa sen Ghana mpoano' - Murtala video no san bae.
backtranslated: 'I like Stonebwoy; his wisdom is more than Ghana's coastline' - Murtala's video came back.

text: Trump says 11 killed in US strike on drug-carrying vessel from Venezuela.
translated: Trump ka sɛ wokunkum nnipa 11 wɔ United States hyɛn a ɛrekɔfa nnubɔne fi Venezuela no so.
backtranslated: Trump says 11 people were killed on a US ship bound for Venezuela to transport drugs.

text: Paul Adom-Otchere ordered to appear before Special Prosecutor over GACL audit deal.
translated: Paul Adom-Otchere hyɛe sɛ ɔmfa asɛm no nkɔto Ɔtoɔtohɔ Dwumadibea titiriw anim wɔ GACL nhwehwɛmu nhyehyɛe no ho.
backtranslated: Paul Adom-Otchere ordered the case to be referred to the Special Reporting Office for the GACL investigation program.

text: Artistes who have sampled Daddy Lumba’s classic songs.
translated: Artists a wɔayi nnwom a Daddy Lumba  ayɛ no ayɛ.
backtranslated: Artists who have released music by Daddy Lumba.

text: Known NPP sympathizer like GBA pres shouldn’t be calling for Torkornoo to be reinstated — Kpebu.
translated: Ɛnsɛ sɛ obi a onim NPP ho asɛm te sɛ GBA Pres no frɛ sɛ wɔnsan mfa Torkornoo mmra  Kpebu adwuma mu.
backtranslated: A person with knowledge of NPPs such as GBA Pres should not call for the return of Torkornoo to Kpebu's work.

text: Party stalwarts should act responsibly at polling stations – Prof Gyampo.
translated: Ɛsɛ sɛ amanyɔkuw no mufo yɛ wɔn ade wɔ asennii ahorow so  Ɔbenfo Gyampo.
backtranslated: The members of the political party must act in the courts, Dr. Gyampo.

text: National Cathedral audit uncovers massive financial irregularities – Kwakye Ofosu details.
translated: Ɔman Asɔrefi Nhwehwɛmufo no ahu sikasɛm mu nsisi kɛse  Kwakye Ofosu ho nsɛm.
backtranslated: The National Cathedral Examiner has found cases of massive financial fraud involving Kwakye Ofosu.

text: How I convinced Omane Boamah to quit NPP for NDC – Ato Ahwoi.
translated: Sɛnea mebɛka kyerɛɛ Omane Boamah sɛ omfi NPP nkɔ NDC  Ato Ahwoi.
backtranslated: How I would tell Omane Boamah to move from NPP to NDC Ato Ahwoi.

text: WAFCON 2024: Ghana ready to battle for bronze – Stella Nyamekye.
translated: WAFCON 2024: Ghana siesiee ne ho sɛ ɔbɛko ama ɔforohyia  Stella Nyamekye.
backtranslated: WAFCON 2024: Ghana prepares to fight for the wedding of Stella Goddess.

text: Sack all appointees who have left their jobs to campaign to replace you – Kwesi Pratt to Mahama.
translated: Sɛ obi gyaw ne nnwuma hɔ kɔyɛ ɔsatu a, gye sɛ ɔsan de wo si Kwesi Pratt ananmu ma Mahama.
backtranslated: If anyone leaves his job to campaign, he must return to Kwesi Pratt for Mahama.

text: Prof Mills would be outraged with level of galamsey destruction, toxic politics – Charlotte Osei.
translated: Sɛ Professor Mills ka sɛ na wɔsɛe galamsey, na wɔyɛ amanyɔsɛm a ɛyɛ hu a, na ne bo afuw Charlotte Osei.
backtranslated: When Professor Mills said that the Gallimsey was being destroyed and that the politics were dangerous, Charlotte Osei was furious.

text: Local government minister swears in new board members for ILGS, LUSPA.
translated: Ɔman no muni de wɔn ho hyɛ ILGS, LUSPA kuw no mufo foforo mu.
backtranslated: A citizen joins the ILGS, another member of the LUSPA group.

text: Farmers to receive $5,040 per tonne of cocoa for 2025/2026 season.
translated: Afuwfo benya sika a ɛboro dɔla 5,040 wɔ kɔkɔɔ biara mu wɔ afe 2025/2026 bere so.
backtranslated: Farmers will receive more than $5,040 per red in the 2025/2026 season.

text: Obofour and Agradaa must settle their beef in court instead of social media – Onegod.
translated: Obofour ne Agradaa gye sɛ wɔsiesie wɔn ntam wɔ asɛnnibea sen sɛ wɔbɛkɔ akɔfa wɔn ho adi nkitaho wɔ nkratafa so.
backtranslated: Obofour and Agradaa should settle their differences in court rather than go to the pages to communicate.

text: There are over 100,000 people living with and spreading HIV without knowing it - AIDS Commission boss.
translated: Nnipa bɛboro 100,000 na wɔwom na wɔkyekyɛ HIV a wonnim.
backtranslated: It has more than 100,000 members who share HIV without knowing it.

text: Use COVID-19 fund to strengthen health care, immunization financing — HFFG.
translated: Fa COVID-19 sika no hyɛ ayaresa ho den, tua nnuru a wɔde boa wɔn no ho sika  HFFG.
backtranslated: Use COVID-19 funds to strengthen healthcare, pay for medication to help them HFFG.

text: 2022 most controversial celebrities.
translated: 2022 mu no, nnipa a wɔn ho akyinnyegye ahyɛ wɔn mu pii.
backtranslated: In 2022, there will be a lot of controversies.

text: Awutu Senya East MCE kick-starts fix all potholes in Kasoa.
translated: Awutu Senya East MCE fi ase siesie amoa nyinaa wɔ Kasoa.
backtranslated: Awutu Senya East MCE has started repairing all the holes in Kasoa.

text: 'My house was attacked after I prophesied Mahama's win in 2024 Election' - Prophet Worlasi.
translated: 'M'asɔrefi no so na wɔtow hyɛɛ me bere a mekaa Mahama nkonimdi ho nkɔmhyɛ wɔ 2024 Asɛnka no mu no.' - Odiyifo Worlasi.
backtranslated: 'My church was attacked when I prophesied Mahama's victory in the 2024 Sermon.' - The Prophet Worlasi.

text: 2019 Asante Akyem Marathon set for April 22.
translated: Asante Akyem Marathon 2019 a wɔde asi hɔ April 22.
backtranslated: Thank you for the Marathon 2019 scheduled for April 22.

text: Daddy Lumba's one-week observation in jeopardy?.
translated: Papa Lumba dii nnawɔtwe biako wɔ hɔ a na ɔrehwɛ nneɛma yiye?
backtranslated: Did Father Lumba spend a week there, keeping an eye on things?

text: Ghanaian artiste Kay9ice composes ‘Mind Games’ to celebrate Davido, Chioma.
translated: Ghanafo nnwontofo Kay9ice kyerɛw Mind Games de dii Davido, Chioma ho animuonyam.
backtranslated: Ghanaian singer Kay9ice wrote Mind Games in honor of Davido, Chioma.

text: National Functional Sports League to hold two-day competition.
translated: Wɔbɛhyɛ da adi nna abien wɔ National Functional Sports League.
backtranslated: The show will be held for two days at the National Functional Sports League.

text: Father threatens legal action against popular SHS for alleged negligence.
translated: Agya no hunahunaa sɛ ɔbɛtwe nkurɔfo a wɔwɔ SHS no aso esiane sɛ wɔanni no yiye nti.
backtranslated: The father threatened to punish people at SHS for not being good to him.

text: CID Director General sworn in as a board member of Small Arms Commission.
translated: CID Ɔmanpanyin no hyɛe sɛ ɔyɛ Akode Nketewa Ho Nhyehyɛe no muni.
backtranslated: The President of the CID has declared himself a member of the Small Arms Initiative.

text: Is Daddy Lumba dead or alive? - What we know so far.
translated: So Daddy Lumba awu anaasɛ ɔte ase?
backtranslated: Is Daddy Lumba dead or alive?

text: Ghana urgently needs a pricing regulatory authority to stabilise the economy.
translated: Ghana hia tumi a ɛhwɛ nneɛma so ntɛmntɛm na ama wagyina hɔ wɔ sikasɛm mu.
backtranslated: Ghana needs a rapidly growing economy to maintain its economic standing.

text: Coronavirus: Africa needs US$285 billion to fight off pandemic impact - IMF.
translated: Coronavirus: Afrika hia dɔla ɔpepepem 285 de adi dwuma de adi atiridii a ɛrekɔ so no so - IMF.
backtranslated: Coronavirus: Africa needs $285 billion to control the ongoing malaria outbreak - IMF.

text: Why NPP and NDC are responsible for the  poor state of sports - Dan Kwaku Yeboah explains.
translated: Nea enti a NPP ne NDC na ɛde amannɔne ho asɛm ba - Dan Kwaku Yeboah kyerɛkyerɛ mu.
backtranslated: Why the NPP and NDC are the source of foreign policy - Dan Kwaku Yeboah explains.

text: 2 dead as police engage in a shootout with highway robbery gang.
translated: 2 awu bere a polisifo ne mmirikaw kuw bi a wɔwiaa nneɛma wɔ mmɔnten so no bɔɔ nsra.
backtranslated: 2 died after a police and a gang of street robbers camped.

text: I’m now focused on returning to athletics - Martha Bissah.
translated: Seesei, mepɛ sɛ mesan kɔ atletiki mu.
backtranslated: Now I want to return to athletics.

text: Ghana's Abrefa wins medals at London Table Tennis Grand Prix.
translated: Ghanafo Abrefa di nkonimbo wɔ London Table Tennis Grand Prix.
backtranslated: Ghanaian Abrefa is winning the London Table Tennis Grand Prix.

text: Woman flees from marriage after several death threats from husband.
translated: Ɔbea guan fi aware mu bere a ne kunu bɔɔ no hu mpɛn pii no.
backtranslated: A woman fled her marriage after her husband repeatedly threatened her.

text: Pure FM studio burnt to ashes.
translated: Wɔhyew FM adwumayɛbea a emu tew no guu mfuturo mu.
backtranslated: The FM station was burned to the ground.

text: IET Ghana mourns victims of helicopter crash.
translated: IET Ghana kɔda ɔkraw a ɔkorow no sɛee no so.
backtranslated: IET Ghana lies on the wreck of the ship.

text: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC reminds me of David killing Uriah for his wife' - Dr Okoe Boye.
translated: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC ma mekae Dawid a ɔkunkum Uriah maa ne yere no ho asɛm.' - Dr. Okoe Boye.
backtranslated: Ablekuma North Violence: 'NDC reminds me of David who killed Uriah for his wife.' - Dr. Okoe Boye.

text: Any police officer sent to Akwatia by-election without a weapon is at risk – Okoe Boye warns.
translated: Polisifo a wɔde wɔn ho ahyɛ akode kɔ Akwatia mmusuakuw mu no nyinaa betumi anya asiane. Okoe Boye bɔ kɔkɔ.
backtranslated: Police forces that are armed with weapons to the Akwatia tribes are at risk.

text: Chelsea players 'brag' about teams they want to face ahead of Champions League draw.
translated: Chelseafo 'hyehyɛ' akuw a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔne wɔn di no ho ansa na Champions League no adu.
backtranslated: Chelsea have 'formed' their own teams before the Champions League.

text: Safe Water Network commissions over $800,000 Asikuma Home Water Station.
translated: Aman a Ɛwɔ Aman Aman Aman So Network no de $800,000 kɔ Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikuma Asikum
backtranslated: The International Network of States Parties has committed $800,000 to the development of the International Mine Safety and Health Organization (IMS) and to the development of the International Mine Safety and Health Organization (IOM) in the area of the United Nations Environment Programme.

text: 'Thank you Ablekuma North, together we made history!' - Ewurabena Aubynn after rerun victory.
translated: 'Meda wo ase sɛ Ablekuma North, yɛn nyinaa yɛɛ abakɔsɛm!' - Ewurabena Aubynn wɔ mmirikatu a odii so nkonim akyi.
backtranslated: 'Thank you as Ablekuma North, we all made history!' - Mrs. Aubynn after winning the race.

text: Kwabena Poku wins 7th Captain One Major championship.
translated: Kwabena Poku dii kan nyaa Captain One Major nkonimdi.
backtranslated: Kwabena Poku first won the Captain One Major victory.

text: PDP zone 2027 presidential candidate to south, five key takeaways from critical NEC meeting.
translated: PDP faako 2027 manpanyin gyinabea a ɛwɔ anafo fam, nneɛma atitiriw anum a efi NEC nhyiam a ɛho hia no mu bae.
backtranslated: The PDP is set to take over the 2027 presidential elections in the south, five key developments from the important NEC meeting.

text: Fugitive wanted over Australia police killings being helped, police say.
translated: Wɔde mmoa maa Australia polisifo a wɔrehwehwɛ obi a ɔretu kwan no, polisifo ka sɛ wɔrehwehwɛ no.
backtranslated: Australian police were assisted in the search for a traveler, police say.

text: Reks Brobby to serve on technical committee for 14th African Games.
translated: Reks Brobby bɛsom wɔ Afrika Mfe 14 no ho nyansahyɛ boayikuw no mu.
backtranslated: Reks Brobby will serve on the committee for the Africa 14 Year Programme.

text: Watch when Usain Bolt showed how fast he is against regular, everyday people.
translated: Hwɛ sɛnea Usain Bolt daa ne ho adi sɛ ɔyɛ ntɛm de ne ho hyɛ nnipa a wɔte saa no mu.
backtranslated: Consider how quick Usain Bolt proved to be in such a situation.

text: Lifestyle: Tactics for successful career branding.
translated: Asetena mu nneyɛe: Nneɛma a ɛbɛma obi anya adwuma a ɔyɛ no so mfaso.
backtranslated: Social values: The values that make a person's work worthwhile.

text: 'I was made for this' - Bawumia as he leads Africa’s digital agenda at Cambridge.
translated: 'Wɔbɔɔ me sɛ menyɛ eyi' - Bawumia bere a ɔredi Afrika' dwumadibea a wɔyɛ no Intanɛt so wɔ Cambridge no anim.
backtranslated: 'I was born to do this' - Bawmumia as he heads the Africa's online channel in Cambridge.

text: Salaga-South MP distributes 650 bags of fertiliser to constituents to boost farming.
translated: Salaga-South MP no de aduaba nkotoku 650 maa wɔn a wɔpaw wɔn no de hyɛɛ afuw mu adwuma no den.
backtranslated: Salaga-South MP presented 650 bags of fruit to the elected representatives to strengthen the farm.

text: Speaker Bagbin ‘in ruthless pain’ over fatal helicopter crash.
translated: Ɔkasafo Bagbin wɔ amanehunu a enni ano mu  wɔ ɔkraw a ɛbɔɔ no ho.
backtranslated: Speaker Bagbin suffers from endless pain from the bite.

text: Crackdown on Fake Titles: We must move from 'title worship' to performance - Prof Bokpin.
translated: Wɔbɛsɛe nsɛm a ɛnyɛ nokware: Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛfi 'title worship' mu kɔ dwumadi mu - Ɔbenfo Bokpin.
backtranslated: False information will be destroyed: We must move from 'title worship' to performance - Professor Bokpin.

text: Paul Bongo releases 'This Party'.
translated: Paul Bongo yii 'This Party' adi.
backtranslated: Paul Bongo released 'This Party'.

text: Year in Review: Greatest showbiz scandals of 2023.
translated: Afe a Wɔhwɛ Mu: Afe 2023 animde ho nsɛm a ɛyɛ hu sen biara.
backtranslated: Year of the Watch: The most dangerous predictions of the year 2023.

text: 'I spent over $15,000 on my TGMAs performance' - Fameye.
translated: 'Midii bɛboro dɔla 15,000 de yɛɛ m'adwuma wɔ TGMA' - Fameye.
backtranslated: 'I spent more than $15,000 on my TGMA job' - Fameye.

text: 2023 AFCON: Nigeria reach final after edging South Africa on penalties.
translated: 2023 AFCON: Nigeria kɔɔ awiei bere a wodii South Africa anim wɔ asotwe mu no.
backtranslated: 2023 AFCON: Nigeria finished as the top seed in the tournament after defeating South Africa in the penalty shoot-out.

text: Nkwanta North records first Mpox case - District Health Director.
translated: Nkwanta Atifi fam kyerɛw Mpox ho asɛm a edi kan - Ɔmantam Apɔwmuden Dwumadibea.
backtranslated: The first report on Mpox was written by the North Ward - Regional Health Department.

text: 'Calculated attempt to divide us' – Appiagyei slams move to replace Afenyo-Markin at ECOWAS Parliament.
translated: 'Abɔde a wɔde ayɛ akontaa sɛ wɔbɛpae yɛn mu'  Appiagyei de ne nsa asi Afenyo-Markin ananmu wɔ ECOWAS Amanamanmufo Asɛnnibea.
backtranslated: 'The creature who is calculated to divide us' Appiagyei has signed on behalf of Afenyo-Markin at the International Court of Justice of ECOWAS.

text: Ridge Hospital: One arrested in connection with assault on health workers.
translated: Ridge Yareɛbea: Wɔkyeree obi wɔ ɔtaa a ɔtoo ayaresafo so no ho.
backtranslated: Ridge Hospital: An arrest for assaulting a medical officer.

text: R2Bees storm Accra Technical University on July 18 for WatsUp on campus.
translated: R2Bees tow hyɛɛ Accra Technical University so July 18 de bɔɔ WatsUp wɔ sukuu no mu.
backtranslated: R2Bees attacked Accra Technical University on July 18 to attack WatsUp in the school.

text: Bawku SHS shut down after the fatal shooting of a final-year student.
translated: Bawku SHS no twae esiane sɛ wɔtow hyɛɛ sukuufo bi a wɔadu wɔn afe a etwa to no so no so nti.
backtranslated: The SHS gang was shut down because of an attack on a group of high school seniors.

text: Pharmaceutical distributor fined GH¢1.
translated: Wɔde ka a wɔde to gua no maa GH¢1.
backtranslated: The bill was paid to GH¢1.

text: How can Partey rape one woman three times? – Kankam Boadu questions charges.
translated: Ɔkwan bɛn so na Partey betumi ahunahuna ɔbea biako mprɛnsa?
backtranslated: How could Partey threaten a woman three times?

text: Editorial by Ghanaian Times: Tons of commendations for Appiatse’s rebirth.
translated: Ghana Times kyerɛwfo: Appiatse awoɔ foforo no ho nkamfo pii.
backtranslated: Ghana Times columnist: Many praise for the new birth of Appiatse.

text: 'I was persecuted' - ACP Agordzo gives blow-by-blow account on alleged coup trial.
translated: "Wɔtaa me" - ACP Agordzo ka ɔdan a wɔabɔ no sobo sɛ ɔyɛ aban tumidi ho asɛm.
backtranslated: "I'm being persecuted" - ACP Agordzo describes the building being accused of being a government dictator.

text: Prof Ransford Gyampo reveals why he accepted Mahama's call to serve after several offers.
translated: Ɔbenfo Ransford Gyampo ma yehu nea enti a ogyee Mahama frɛ no sɛ ɔnkɔsom wɔ asɔretia ahorow bi akyi.
backtranslated: Dr. Ransford Gyampo explains why he accepted Mahama's invitation to serve despite some opposition.

text: Bankrogya community isolated by floodwaters, cries for basic infrastructure.
translated: Bankrogya man a nsuyiri atwa wɔn ho ahyia no, wɔresrɛ sɛ wɔmfa nneɛma a ɛho hia nni dwuma.
backtranslated: Bankrogy, a flooded country, is begging for the necessities of life.

text: Uganda in talks to import all its oil via Tanzania.
translated: Uganda redi amanne sɛ wɔde ne ngo nyinaa bɛba Tanzania.
backtranslated: Uganda is in the process of importing all its oil into Tanzania.

text: Movement for Change shuts down NPP comeback claims.
translated: Movement for Change no gyaee NPP a ɛsan bae no ho asɛm.
backtranslated: The Movement for Change stopped talking about the return of the NPP.

text: Frimpong-Manso Institute mourns victims of devastating helicopter crash.
translated: Frimpong-Manso Adwumakuw no di ahummɔbɔ a ɛtoo helikopta no ho awerɛhow.
backtranslated: The Frimpong-Manso Company is mourning the tragedy of the helicopter crash.

text: You are sick if you have protruding stomach - Dr Dominic Nitiwul.
translated: Sɛ wo yafunu yɛ den a, wo ho yɛ wo den.
backtranslated: When your stomach is strong, you are strong.

text: Alhaji Grusah drops match fixing allegations claims against Dreams FC.
translated: Alhaji Grusah de nsɛm a wɔka tiaa Dreams FC no siesiee.
backtranslated: Alhaji Grusah has solved the allegations against Dreams FC.

text: Ghanaians urged to resolve disputes peacefully.
translated: Wɔhyɛɛ Ghanafo nkuran sɛ wonsiesie akasakasa no asomdwoe mu.
backtranslated: Ghanaians were encouraged to resolve the dispute peacefully.

text: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad star at 2024 Tebel All Ghana Badminton Championship.
translated: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad yɛ animdefo wɔ 2024 Tebel All Ghana Badminton Championship.
backtranslated: Moslena Adu, Ahmed Abdul Samad is the head coach of the 2024 Tebel All Ghana Badminton Championship.

text: Why was Kevin Taylor's arrest warrant not enforced?.
translated: Dɛn nti na wɔankɔfa Kevin Taylor asennii ho asɛm no amfa amfa ammɔ wɔn ho ban?
backtranslated: Why was Kevin Taylor's case not brought in defense?

text: Rejected by their stepfather at 9, he and his twin turned to eating leftovers, sleeping in the cold.
translated: Bere a wɔn agya panyin poo no bere a na wadi mfe akron no, ɔne ne babea baanu no kɔdii aduan a aka no, na wɔda awɔw mu.
backtranslated: When their father refused to let her go when she was nine years old, he and his two daughters ate the rest of the food, and they slept in the cold.

text: Serve funeral guests according to their donations - Lower Axim Traditional Council directs.
translated: Sɛ obi kɔ asie a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔde ne sika a ɔde ama no ma no.
backtranslated: If anyone goes to a funeral, he should give him his money.

text: Ghanaian men do not know how to make love - Delkie claims.
translated: Delkie ka sɛ Ghana mmarima nnim sɛnea wɔbɛdɔ.
backtranslated: Delkie says that Ghanaian men do not know how to love.

text: COVID-19: Mass vaccination ahead of Christmas begins December 14-18 - GHS.
translated: COVID-19: Ɔhaw a wɔde bɔ nnipa pii yare ansa na wɔrebɛhyɛ Buronya no fi ase December 14-18 - GHS.
backtranslated: COVID-19: The most common health problems before Christmas start on December 14-18 - GHS.

text: Accra Mayor pledges Hockey support.
translated: Akra Ɔmampanyin no hyɛ bɔ sɛ ɔbɛboa wɔn wɔ Hockey ho.
backtranslated: The President of Akra promises to help them with Hockey.

text: COVID-19: All set for second dose vaccination in Ashanti Region.
translated: COVID-19: Wɔasiesie nyinaa ama aduro a ɛto so abien a wɔde bɛhyɛ Ashanti Asase no so.
backtranslated: COVID-19: All are ready for the second vaccine to be administered on Ashanti Land.

text: Peace Council condemns violence at Ablekuma North, calls for calm.
translated: Asomdwoe-Aboa no kasa tia basabasayɛ a ɛrekɔ so wɔ Ablekuma Atifi fam, na ɔhyɛ nkuran sɛ wɔnya kommyɛ.
backtranslated: The Peace-Bill condemns the unrest in North Ablekuma and encourages silence.

text: Nigeria's Maduka Okoye banned two months for match fixing.
translated: Wɔbaraa Nigeriafo Maduka Okoye abosome abien wɔ ne mmirikatu ho.
backtranslated: Nigerian Maduka Okoye was banned from running for two months.

text: EL calls for peace with DopeNation after years of misunderstanding.
translated: EL frɛ sɛ asomdwoe mmra DopeNation so bere a ntease a ɛnteɛ a na ɛwɔ hɔ mfe pii akyi.
backtranslated: EL calls for peace on DopeNation after decades of misunderstanding.

text: Staff raise 'alarm' over deplorable state of Janga Technical School infrastructure.
translated: Adwumamfo no bɔ kɔkɔ wɔ Janga Tekinik Sukuu ho nneɛma ho a ɛyɛ awerɛhow ho.
backtranslated: The staff warns of the sadness of the Janga Technical School.

text: Elders of Djetsorkope present newly installed chief to Osudoku Traditional Council.
translated: Djetsorkope mpanyimfo no de ɔsahene foforo a wɔasi no ananmu no kɔma Osudoku Ɔfasu Bagua.
backtranslated: The Djetsorkope officials sent a new replacement commander to the Osudoku Wall Council.

text: We are aiming to win bronze medal against Senegal - Sudan coach Kwesi Appiah.
translated: Yɛpɛ sɛ yedi nkogu wɔ Senegal - Sudan ɔbenfo Kwesi Appiah anim.
backtranslated: We want to lose in Senegal - Sudan to coach Kwesi Appiah.

text: Kudus, Semenyo make official EPL Team of the Week after impressive opening week.
translated: Kudus, Semenyo yɛ EPL Team of the Week wɔ dapɛn a edi kan a ɛyɛ nwonwa no akyi.
backtranslated: Kudus, Semenyo is the EPL Team of the Week after the first amazing week.

text: Sofo Azorka should have been arrested by the police – Nana Boakye.
translated: Ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ kpolisima ne kyekye Sofo Azorka.
backtranslated: The police had to arrest Sofi Azorka.

text: Throwback Thursday: Spotlight on Daasebre Dwamena.
translated: Wukuw a wɔtow no fii hɔ Dwoda: Daasebre Dwamena so.
backtranslated: And the smoke of the burning of the incense went away on the day of the Sabbath.

text: 2022 In Review: Celebrity weddings that made waves.
translated: 2022 Wɔ Nhwehwɛmu: Animdefo ayeforohyia a ɛbɔɔ nkurɔfo huammɔ.
backtranslated: 2022 In Search: A wedding that disrupted the public.

text: FLASHBACK: Watch as NDC member threatens, curses Hawa Koomson over 2024 election violence.
translated: FLASHBACK: Hwɛ sɛnea NDC muni no hunahunaa Hawa Koomson wɔ 2024 abatoɔ basabasayɛ ho.
backtranslated: FLASHBACK: Look at how the NDC member threatened Hawa Koomson about electoral violence in 2024.

text: Ballon D’Or 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang lead nominees for best young player awards.
translated: Ballon DOr 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang na wɔpaw wɔn sɛ wɔn a wɔbɛkɔ so akyekye wɔn ani wɔ agodi a wɔde ma wɔn mmabun a wɔdi agodi no ho.
backtranslated: Ballon DOr 2025: Lamine Yamal, Doue & Michelle Agyemang are chosen as the entertainers for the games for their young players.

text: Why January is generally an economically difficult month.
translated: Nea enti a January yɛ bosome a emu yɛ den wɔ sikasɛm mu no.
backtranslated: Why January is a difficult month for financial institutions.

text: Meet DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, new Director-General of CID trailblazing law enforcement and legal advocacy.
translated: Hu DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, CID Ɔpanyin foforo a ɔyɛ ɔkwampaefo wɔ mmara ho adwuma ne mmara ho asɛmpaka mu.
backtranslated: Meet DCOP Lydia Yaako Donkor, another CID Director who is a pioneer in the legal profession and the legal gospel.

text: It was a childish decision - Obiri Boahen slams NPP for disbanding vigilante groups.
translated: Ná ɛyɛ gyinae a mmofra de - Obiri Boahen ka NPP ho asɛm sɛ ɛrebɛsɛe nneduafo kuw.
backtranslated: It was a decision by the youth - Obiri Boahen, who told NPP that he was destroying a group of prisoners.

text: Helicopter Crash: Ghana has lost a potential president in Omane Boamah – Ebo Whyte.
translated: Helicopter Crash: Ghana ahwere ɔmampanyin bi wɔ Omane Boamah  Ebo Whyte.
backtranslated: Helicopter Crash: Ghana loses a president in Omane Boamah Ebo Whyte.

text: LIVESTREAMED: Kwaku Dawuro presents The Movement in the Morning Political Show.
translated: NNIPA A WƆDE HƆ: Kwaku Dawuro na ɔde The Movement in the Morning Political Show no rema.
backtranslated: THE OWNER: Kwaku Dawuro is presenting The Movement in the Morning Political Show.

text: I don't mind if Ghanaians want to vote a president for more than two terms – Freddie Blay.
translated: Sɛ Ghanafo pɛ sɛ wɔpaw ɔmampanyin bi a ɔfata asennii abien no a, memfa ho asɛm.
backtranslated: I don't care if Ghanaians want to elect a president who is fit for both courts.

text: Students Loan Trust Fund warns against unauthorised use of Logo on billboards.
translated: Sukuufo Ɛdefo Adwumayɛbea Kɔbea bɔ kɔkɔ wɔ Logo a wɔmfa nni dwuma wɔ nkrataa so ho.
backtranslated: The Office of Student Publishers warns against using a Logo on a postcard.

text: South African influencer apologises over viral Russian job videos.
translated: South African influencer no de video a wɔato din Russia adwuma ho video a ɛresɛe no kyɛw.
backtranslated: The South African influencer apologized for the corruption of the Russian business video.

text: Full list of award winners at the 2023 AFCON.
translated: AFCON 2023 no mu nkonimdifo no din a edi mũ.
backtranslated: The full name of the AFCON 2023 winner.

text: Daddy Lumba's 'Yentie Obiaa' helped me through money ritual allegations - LilWin.
translated: Daddy Lumba 'Yentie Obiaa' boaa me ma migyinaa sika ho amanne a wɔde bɔɔ me no ano.
backtranslated: Daddy Lumba's 'Don't Ask' helped me to cope with the financial crisis.

text: Meet Benedicta Kwartemaa: The OKESS sprinting princess.
translated: Hu Benedicta Kwartemaa: OkESS mmirikafo panyin.
backtranslated: See Benedicta Kwartemaa: Chief racing officer of OkESS.

text: Ex-convict teacher jailed 48 years for defiling 7-year-old girl.
translated: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo bi a na ɔyɛ obi a wɔde no ato afiase mfe 48 esiane sɛ ɔhyɛɛ abofra bi a wadi mfe ason ho awu nti.
backtranslated: A former teacher who had been jailed for 48 years for murdering a seven-year-old boy.

text: Highlights of Dr Bawumia's electrifying speech after filing his nomination.
translated: Dr. Bawumia kasa a ɛyɛ anigye a ɔyɛe bere a ɔde ne din sii hɔ no ho nsɛntitiriw.
backtranslated: Highlights of Dr. Bawumia's interesting speech when he made his name.

text: Hearts of Oak coach Didi Dramani stresses determination to bring ‘sustainability and success' to the club.
translated: Hearts of Oak kyerɛkyerɛfo Didi Dramani hyɛ mmɔdenbɔ a ɔde rebrɛ 'bammɔ ne nkɔso' ama klab no so dua.
backtranslated: Hearts of Oak coach Didi Dramani emphasizes his efforts to bring 'safety and prosperity' to the club.

text: Events that shocked the nation in 2020.
translated: Nsɛm a esisii wɔ afe 2020 mu no yɛɛ ɔman no nwonwa.
backtranslated: The events of 2020 shocked the nation.

text: Sports minister halts unlawful development of parts of Borteyman sports complex.
translated: Agodie Ɔmanpanyin no siw agodie a wɔde siesie agodie no afã bi ho kwan.
backtranslated: The President of the Games has banned some aspects of the game.

text: Exiled Across the Ocean: How the British banished Agyemang Prempeh I and his chiefs to Seychelles.
translated: Wɔpam Agyemang Prempeh I ne ne mpanyimfo kɔɔ Seychelles.
backtranslated: Agyemang Prempeh I and his officers were deported to the Seychelles.

text: Health Minister lays Ghana Medical Trust Fund Bill before Parliament.
translated: Apɔwmuden Ɔman Dwumadibea no de Ghana Mpata Adwumayɛbea Dwumadibea Apem Nhyehyɛe no kɔma Amanaman Nkabom.
backtranslated: The Ministry of Health has sent the Ghanaian Ministry of Health's Millennium Development Goals to the United Nations.

text: Ghanaians can travel to these 4 countries without visas after Parliament's ratification.
translated: Sɛ Ghanafo gye toom a, wobetumi akɔ aman nnan yi mu a wonnya visa.
backtranslated: If Ghanaians agree, they can enter these four countries without a visa.

text: Watch Joseph Paintsil’s goal in LA Galaxy’s 4-0 win over Santos Laguna.
translated: Hwɛ nea Joseph Paintsil de bɔɔ LA Galaxy a edii Santos Laguna so nkonim 4-0.
backtranslated: See what Joseph Paintsil did with LA Galaxy in a 4-0 win over Santos Laguna.
